trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when a specified event provider name references a disabled event provider.
A disabled event provider cannot publish events.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.
The error message that describes the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class with serialized data.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogProviderDisabledException"></xref> class with an error message and inner exception.
The error message that describes the current exception.
The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
